thread.title: Jonathan Kilmartin
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Jonathan Kilmartin

author: Jonathan Kilmartin
title: Jonathan Kilmartin
text: My car was quickly booked in around my working hours for a full service and MOT (within 24 hours of my request). The lady I spoke too was very helpful and offered the usual service of picking up and returning my car, but as I needed a quick turn around it was arranged that I could drop off and pickup my car from the local garage. The garage completed the above and a representative from Servicing Stop rang to update me on progress and let me know how to pay - I was fortunate enough to benefit from the February discount. I was working away from home & would definitely use the service again - no complaints.
